content.text: I'll verify this claim step by step. Let me first explore the database schema, then query the relevant data.

input.description: List all tables in the database

content.content:
attendance  event       income      member    
budget      expense     major       zip_code

tool_use_result.stdout:
attendance  event       income      member    
budget      expense     major       zip_code

content.content:
CREATE TABLE event
(
    event_id   TEXT
        constraint event_pk
            primary key,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date TEXT,
    type       TEXT,
    notes      TEXT,
    location   TEXT,
    status     TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE major
(
    major_id   TEXT
        constraint major_pk
            primary key,
    major_name TEXT,
    department TEXT,
    college    TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE zip_code
(
    zip_code    INTEGER
        constraint zip_code_pk
            primary key,
    type        TEXT,
    city        TEXT,
    county      TEXT,
    state       TEXT,
    short_state TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "attendance"
(
    link_to_event  TEXT,
    link_to_member TEXT,
    primary key (link_to_event, link_to_member),
    foreign key (link_to_event) references event(event_id),
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "budget"
(
    budget_id     TEXT
            primary key,
    category      TEXT,
    spent         REAL,
    remaining     REAL,
    amount        INTEGER,
    event_status  TEXT,
    link_to_event TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_event) references event(event_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "expense"
(
    expense_id          TEXT
            primary key,
    expense_description TEXT,
    expense_date        TEXT,
    cost                REAL,
    approved            TEXT,
    link_to_member      TEXT,
    link_to_budget      TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_budget) references budget(budget_id),
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "income"
(
    income_id      TEXT
        constraint income_pk
            primary key,
    date_received  TEXT,
    amount         INTEGER,
    source         TEXT,
    notes          TEXT,
    link_to_member TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "member"
(
    member_id     TEXT
        constraint member_pk
            primary key,
    first_name    TEXT,
    last_name     TEXT,
    email         TEXT,
    position      TEXT,
    t_shirt_size  TEXT,
    phone         TEXT,
    zip           INTEGER,
    link_to_major TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_major) references major(major_id),
    foreign key (zip) references zip_code(zip_code)
);

content.text: Now let me query for members in the Electrical and Computer Engineering Department with position 'Member' who are from Georgetown, South Carolina.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/student_club.sqlite" "SELECT m.member_id, m.first_name, m.last_name, m.position, maj.department, z.city, z.state FROM member m JOIN major maj ON m.link_to_major = maj.major_id JOIN zip_code z ON m.zip = z.zip_code WHERE maj.department = 'Electrical and Computer Engineering Department' AND m.position = 'Member' AND z.city = 'Georgetown' AND z.state = 'South Carolina';"
input.description: Check for members matching all criteria

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/student_club.sqlite" "SELECT m.member_id, m.first_name, m.last_name, m.position, maj.department, z.city, z.state FROM member m JOIN major maj ON m.link_to_major = maj.major_id JOIN zip_code z ON m.zip = z.zip_code WHERE maj.department = 'Electrical and Computer Engineering Department' AND m.position = 'Member';"
